1: Custom classes and statuses
//- - - - - - - - -//
- [ ] todo
- [?] unknown/todo
- [/] in progress
- [~] in progress 2
- [x] done
- [X] done 2
- [-] cancelled
- [b] not a task
//- - - - - - - - -//
<ul>
<li data-tasks="" class="tasks-item not-checked"><input disabled="" type="checkbox" class="tasks-checkbox"> todo</li>
<li data-tasks="?" class="tasks-item"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox" class="tasks-checkbox"> unknown/todo</li>
<li data-tasks="/" class="tasks-item"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox" class="tasks-checkbox"> in progress</li>
<li data-tasks="~" class="tasks-item"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox" class="tasks-checkbox"> in progress 2</li>
<li data-tasks="x" class="tasks-item"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox" class="tasks-checkbox"> done</li>
<li data-tasks="X" class="tasks-item"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox" class="tasks-checkbox"> done 2</li>
<li data-tasks="-" class="tasks-item"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox" class="tasks-checkbox"> cancelled</li>
<li data-tasks="b" class="tasks-item"><input checked="" disabled="" type="checkbox" class="tasks-checkbox"> not a task</li>
</ul>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//
